item.title: Report E-2024080594
item.description:
Report E-2024080594

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-28T15:13:27+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-23
  • City: PORT ALLEN
  • State: LA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: VEOLIA ES TECHNICAL SOLUTIONS, L.L.C.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: During a trailer loading operation at Veolia's 10-day in-transit facility in Port Allen, Louisiana, an employee observed a small puddle of liquid on the ground beneath a recently moved pallet. Upon closer examination, it was discovered that one of the drums on the pallet had sustained a minor gash near its base. The leak was estimated to be approximately half an ounce of liquid. The spill was immediately addressed using oil-dry absorbent material, and the damaged drum was safely transferred into an overpack container to prevent further leakage.
